import React from "react"; import { FaBuilding, FaStore, FaBriefcase, FaHome } from "react-icons/fa"; const Home = () => { const categories = [ { name: "Commercial Land", icon: , count: 12 }, { name: "Showrooms & Shops", icon: , count: 18 }, { name: "Office Rooms", icon: , count: 9 }, { name: "Residential", icon: , count: 25 }, ]; return (

Buy • Sell • Rent • Luxury Estates • Apartments • Farmhouses

{/* Updated Slim Search Bar */}
{/* Category Cards Section */}
{categories.map((item, index) => (
{item.icon}

{item.name}

))}
); }; export default Home;
